column15: events_name
column17: description
Baseline traffic situation of driving with ego vehicle as AV

column15: [1. Represents the period when the target car has its indicator on,2. The target car changes its lane,The target car overtakes the ego car]
column17: The ego car is overtaken by the target car from the inside

column15: [1. The target car approaches the ego car,2. The target car tailgates the ego car]
column17: The target car tailgates the ego car

column15: [1. A red car in front of the target car brakes,2. The target car in front of the ego car brakes]
column17: The target car brakes abruptly to avoid collision

column15: [1. The target car brakes]
column17: The target car brakes abruptly

column15: [1. The target car is waiting at the intersection,2 Represents the moment when the traffic lights turn green]
column17: The target car starts late when traffic lights turn green

column15: [1. The target car is waiting at the intersection,2 Represents the moment when the traffic lights turn green]
column17: The target car starts late when traffic lights turn green with a pedestrian

column15: [1. Represents the period when the target car has its indicators on,2. The target car cuts off the ego car from the right lane.]
column17: The target car cuts off from the right lane

column15: [1. The target car is zigzagging in the traffic flow]
column17: The target car is zigzagging

column15: [1. Represents the period when the target car has its headlights blinking]
column17: The target car flashes lights to the ego car

column15: [1. The platoon of target cars are passing by the ego car,2. Represents the period when the ego car has its turning indicators on,3. The ego car changes the lane]
column17: The ego car’s changing lane is prevented by a platoon of AVs

column15: [1. The target car is driving slowly in front of the ego car]
column17: The target car drives slowly in front of the ego car

column15: [1. Represents the period when the target car has its indicator on,2. The target car and change its lane to let ego car pass first]
column17: The target car changes lanes to let the ego car behind overtake

column15: [1. Represents the period when the target car has its indicator on,2. The target car changes its lane and goes back to the lane]
column17: The target car attempts to move from the centre to the left lane but goes back to the centre lane so as not to block an ego car behind

column15: [1. Represents the period when the target car has its indicator on,2. The target car decelerates to let the ego car merge lane]
column17: The platoon of AVs lower the speed to let the ego car change lane

column15: [1. A pedestrian crosses the road,2. The target car brakes and stops,3. The ego car brakes and stops.]
column17: The target car is waiting for pedestrians to cross the road
the target car follows its front car with a too large gap

column15: [1. The target car passes the intersection]
column17: The target car passes the intersection exactly at the time when the light changes without deceleration

column15: [1. The target car overtakes the ego car,2. The ego car decelerates to let target car overtake,3. The target car cancels its overtaking and moves back to its lane]
column17: The target car plans to overtake but canceled the process and move back

column15: [1. The target car drives 60kph,2. The car behind the target car decelerates because of the target car’s speed]
column17: The target car obeys the speed limit when the traffic flow drive at around 70

column15: [1. A pedestrian crosses the road, 2. The target car brakes and stops]
column17: The target car brakes abruptly to avoid collision with a pedestrian
